description:
Bellows runs a salvage operation focused on recovering artifacts of old civilization from the sea. She`s the one who discovered http://anidb.net/ch51227 [Led] and http://anidb.net/ch51232 [Chamber] at the bottom of the ocean and pulled them up. She excels at operating the heavy labor robot, Yunboro. She`s a caring older sister figure who`s strict when it comes to work, and her comrades all have great faith in her. She`s 18.
Source: ANN
name: Bellows
